EmailTemplate.name: ALT NAMES REQUIRED EMAIL
EmailTemplate.subject: Your LLC Name is Not Available
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please Respond with Alternate Business Names Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
After conducting a name search, we have discovered that your requested [Entity Type] name choices are not available.
Please respond to me via email with three (3) other choices, in order of preference, or call me at (877) 808-1918 M-F, 9:00 AM – 6 PM PT. After I receive your reply, we will conduct another search to determine if the proposed names are available.
Please contact me at your earliest convenience to avoid any delays in your order. We are not able to file your documents with the Secretary of State unless your [Entity Type] name is available.
Best Regards,
[Account Manager] [ext.XXXX] Account Management Services T: 877-808-1918, M-F 9:00 am – 6 pm PT
{!snippetVariable.ccsincerely}
{!snippetVariable.cclegalzoomline} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccphone} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address} {!snippetVariable.lz_website}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy.
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
